page.title: 12INDUSTRY 2
page.content: Sahara Windows make and fit double_ glazing and employ 60 people. The site covers at least 1 acre. 70% of the employees live in Crowborough and work a single shift.Sahara Windows sponsor a gymnastics team and have their own football and cricket teams. Two small traditional industries are a guitar manufacturer and a blacksmith. Wooden instruments are made at Mansons Guitars.They obtain the wood from all over the world.Three people work together on an equal basis. The Forge is one of the last black_ smiths in Sussex but work is dangerous for the three people employed there who live locally.
